test_Description:
1.Open browser and navigate to URL :
"https://lcaas.techmahindra.com/java/
2. Enter the value 'demouser' in the field.
3. Enter the value 'demouser1' in the field.
4. Click on 'Login'.
5. Click on 'Flow Diagrams'.
6. Click on 'Program Process Flow'.
7. Click on 'APARTMENT'.
8. Click on 'AddApartment.java'.
9. Click on 'doPost'.
10. Click on 'Submit'.
11. Click on 'Download'.
